website_summaries.verdict: Minecraft continues to grow larger, and whether you’d rather survive in the underground or build whatever you can dream up, this creative game is only limited by your imagination.
pros: Play with friends on other consoles

website_summaries.verdict: Minecraft offers an infinite, blocky world of creativity where you earn your own reward by mining the landscape to build whatever your heart desires.
pros: Numerous materials to gather and items to craft

customer_reviews.title: No issues, excellent game
customer_reviews.text: Minecraft is positively one of the best games I've ever played, and I've enjoyed it from my childhood all the way through to adulthood. The possibilities are endless, and even if you've played the vanilla game to completion there's a huge community behind it that have created countless fantastic mods and multiplayer servers which extend your game time more or less forever. I would recommend buying the official game codes like this one instead of the cheap accounts you see on Ebay as those ones are actually accounts that have been stolen from other people and resold (which explains their confusingly low price)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hours of endless fun for any age
customer_reviews.text: Amazon were selling Minecraft cheaper than Microsoft were. Instantly stores your download code on Amazon and no problems whatsoever. Download from Minecraft official website and works on both my PC and Mac. The game is perfect for anyone, children and adults alike. Creativity, exploration, building. This Java version allows for heavy modding and multiplayer servers that you can find anywhere on the internet. The game is whatever you make of it.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: It did not work
customer_reviews.text: Well this is a review for the code rather than the game it should have given access to. On that basis it is zero stars. I took a risk by ignoring the high level of negative reviews and I was wrong to have done so. The code was rejected on entering the first character. Now I believe this is to do with Mojang/Microsoft who provide the codes to Amazon but there may be issues with the description here such as which version of Minecraft this code is for and where it needs to be redeemed. Refunded by Amazon without quibble as always but a pain overall. Avoid.
customer_reviews.author: Threesenuf

customer_reviews.title: Wrong product code - impossible to get a straight answer as contact details removed
customer_reviews.text: supplied with defective product key, hours of wasted life trying to sort this as nobody would own up to the mistake. need instant contact details for problems like this. Eventually sorted by refund.
customer_reviews.author: Mr G.

customer_reviews.title: Not quite as easy as they make it out as I purchase this ...
customer_reviews.text: Not quite as easy as they make it out as I purchase this a few weeks ago and still have not managed to download it yet because of the amount of times I need to go to different sites to get the code to put in here to put there downloaded but still not even played it, it really is not the best way to do it and I've had no help whatsoever
customer_reviews.author: philip shaw

customer_reviews.title: Cannot play with it in the end
customer_reviews.text: I did not manage to connect to a server made in Austria properly when connected, I was in "heaven" not able to move, then server kicked out. I tried different ways of connecting, but we ended up after 2 hours of trying giving up. There must be a way to fix this problem, but to be honest, in my free time, when I just wanna enter a game and play with my friends for a bit, I really don't wanna spend my time with solving something, that should not exist.
customer_reviews.author: Viktoria Pfeff

customer_reviews.title: PC Game Code will not load onto my Windows 8.1 System
customer_reviews.text: I tried several times to load Minecraft onto my system but the Code, although being recognised as genuine, caused everything to freeze up. I also tried to buy direct from minecraft.net to no avail. Purely my thoughts only but a quick internet search tends to indicate to manufacturer is not supporting anything pre-Windows 10. The only bonus being that Amazon quickly refunded the purchase cost.
customer_reviews.author: Tredge

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Looking for a game suitable for old codgers like me and found this often recommended. Don't like the scrambled pixalation, found it didn't grab me and although fairly simple to grasp the controls and animation were poor. Kept trying for a week out of "duty" but at no time did I get that "can't wait to play again" feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast and as expected.
customer_reviews.text: There's not much to say when it comes to digital copies, they provide you with a code which you then redeem. Was a little worried at first due to other reviews here saying the codes didn't work for one reason or another but I had no issues at all, instant code delivery, simply create a minecraft account if you haven't already, redeem, download, have fun!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great! This code is for direct download from the Mojang website not the windows store.
customer_reviews.author: Karl smith

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY! Redeem code does not work!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this and tried several times with several methods to download but none of them worked. Absolute waste of money and very disappointing service from amazon. Will not be buying digital games from them again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Minecraft PC/MAC but also Linux!
customer_reviews.text: This is the game - Minecraft. The purchase is actually a digital code which allows the installation of the complete Minecraft game. It is not as simple as I thought at first as I have a Linux system and the software is made for PC/MAC which entails the installation of Java or open/JDK. After an evening trying to install and continual messages, 'Wrong Code' I went back to the minecraft.net website and found the 'redeem' button. That worked and it installed on Linux. Great program, worth the £ 17.15.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Hendrik Haye

customer_reviews.title: Didn't download correctly
customer_reviews.text: Got as far as redeeming the code then downloaded the software to find it was the Java version. The Java pointed me to MS Stores, MS stores told me I was on the wrong page for win 10 and need MS 365 family which I don't have. And round and round I went, only could run a demo version of Minecraft. Bah!!!! Buyer beware!!
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: ... etc at times) on son & daughters laptop it's fine. PS3 is better but as game is on ...
customer_reviews.text: Works ok but has caused a few issues with daughters laptop (saying that not sure if was this or a Windows update) but other that the odd glitch (running slow etc at times) on son & daughters laptop it's fine. PS3 is better but as game is on different platforms it's unfair to compare on that alone
customer_reviews.author: Nicola

customer_reviews.title: Ensure you buy the correct version!
customer_reviews.text: Had no problems with the purchase, and Minecrat is a SPECTACULAR game. However, make sure you buy the correct version of the game: If you intend to play on console (Switch, PS, XBox), ensure you buy the correct code for your specific console. If you intend to purchase from the Windows 10 store, buy the Microsoft Store version. If you intend to purchase from minecraft.net, buy the "PC/Mac" version. Attempting to mix-and-match will not work.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Crashes my laptop!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our 7 year old son as a treat for good schoolwork. Wish we hadn't bothered. After going through the registration process that takes a bit too long to not be annoying, it took an age to download and now doesn't work. Really disappointing.

customer_reviews.title: Worked exactly like it should, first time.

Unfortunately I needed to purchase Java Minecraft as a gift card for my son and this is the only way. I needn't have worried, I received the key almost immediately. I redeemed the card under my sons Majong account and it registered straight away. He was up and playing in minutes, a very happy boy.

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: When I was younger I had many hours of fun on this game. I would recommend as you get your value for money out of it! It is a great present from the ages of 6 all the way through to 12/13.

However after playing for a few days, the game launcher stop working completely. Tried many times to download again but it didn't work. Stopped trying and felt so sorry for my son.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!

product_meta.title: Minecraft: Java Edition for PC/Mac [Online Game Code]
product_meta.description:
About Minecraft

Minecraft is a game about placing blocks and going on adventures. Explore randomly generated worlds and build amazing things from the simplest of homes to the grandest of castles. Play in Creative Mode with unlimited resources or in Survival Mode, defend against monsters and dig deep into the world to discover the rarest ores. Do all this alone, or work together with your friends over the internet. Build, create, and explore!

The PC Java version is the first version of Minecraft to be released. Often referred to as Minecraft: Java Edition. It supports cross-platform play between Mac OS X, Linux, and Windows. This edition also supports user-created skins. It is the classic version.

Terms & Conditions

This Minecraft software download code is issued by Mojang AB, and will entitle the holder to a license of the Minecraft game. The code may only be redeemed on account.mojang.com, and can be credited towards a new or an existing Mojang account.

A Mojang account and an internet connection are required to redeem this code. These accounts are subject to Mojang AB's Terms and Conditions (found at account.mojang.com/terms). By purchasing this code, you accept these terms and the Terms and Conditions of this code. The code is not redeemable for cash and will not be refunded by Mojang. This code may not be resold. The code is void where prohibited or restricted by law.

Support: Having issues with your account?

If you experience any issues redeeming your code or creating your account, please contact Mojang at help.mojang.com.

Instructions  1. Create an account at minecraft.net/redeem, or if you have an account just log in.
 2. Enter the redemption code when prompted after log in.
 3. Choose your Minecraft player name.
 4. Download the game.
 5. Start the game and enjoy Minecraft!
 6. Keep PIN code for future reference.


 PC Minimum System Requirements: 

 * Processor: Intel Pentium or AMD Athlon 64 (K8) 2.6 Ghz
 * RAM: 2GB
 * Hard Disk: 150MB
 * Video Card: GeForce 200 Series or equivalent
 * Supported OS: Windows 10, Windows 8, Windows 7, Windows Vista, Windows XP, Windows 2000, Windows
 * Additional Requirements: Java (Java SE 7 update or newer) Windows, Linux, or Mac
feature_bullets: Build, create, and explore in Minecraft for PC and Mac! Have ridiculous amounts of fun!
Play alone or with friends. Minecraft for PC/Mac supports online multiplayer and solo play.
Take advantage of limitless supplies and create anything you can imagine in Creative Mode.
Mine, craft, and go on exciting adventures in Survival Mode. Journey into the depths and take on the Ender Dragon, if you dare!

Also features horses, rabbits, chickens, zombies, pigs with saddles, boats, minecarts, TNT, zombies, redstone, villagers, iron golems, potions, maps, books, pickaxes, carrots, and lots, lots more. Honestly, there’s a ludicrous amount of cool things to mess about with. You should give it a go!
